      • sink

        private static void sink​(java.lang.Comparable<Job>[] inputArr,
                         int key,
                         int n)
        Sinks a Job element into its proper position in the entire Max binary heap.
        Parameters:
        inputArr - - the input array containing jobs.
        key - - the index of a Job array that is being compared.
        n - - the size of the Job array.

      • swap

        private static void swap​(java.lang.Comparable<Job>[] inputArr,
                         int a,
                         int b)
        Swaps two values from Job data type used in sink function.
        Parameters:
        inputArr - - the input array containing jobs.
        a - - the index of a Job array that needs to be swapped.
        b - - the index of a Job array that argument a is being swapped with.
